reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MICB 201, BIOL 234. (and third-year standing or higher.)
Questions about registration should be directed to Dr. Kion at tkion@mail.ubc.ca.
courseName: Analysis of Microbial Genes and Genomes
description: Genetic, molecular biological and bioinformatic approaches for the analysis of microbial genomes, gene structure-function and gene expression with emphasis on bacteria.
